sub_title: Emeritus Associate Professor and Director Biomedical Sciences at University Medical Center Utrecht and Utrecht University
summary: Experienced Program Director (17 years) with a demonstrated history of working in higher education. Skilled leader in higher education, teaching, curriculum development, innovation of teaching, lecturing, biomedical research, developmental biology, cell biology, histology, cell biology, electron microscopy, zoology, biodiversity and neuroendocrinology. Strong research professional graduated from Utrecht University, Free University Amsterdam and the Center of Excellence in University Teaching Utrecht University. Experience as a member of the Supervisory Board of the Stichting Honours Student Biomedical Sciences Utrecht University (6 years) and as Honours Dean of the faculty of Medicine at Utrecht University (9 years). Winner of the Teacher Award Utrecht University: Best teacher of the year 2003-2004.

projects.title: Strategic Plan bachelor Biomedical Sciences 2011-2016
projects.description: Strategic plan on the future of the bachelor program Biomedical Sciences at the Utrecht University for the years 2011-2016. The plan outlines what we want to achieve in the next five years. It is a guide for all teachers, students and employees who are involved in the curriculum of the bachelor program. The plan is in line with the strategic plans of the Management of Education and Training (dOO), the University Medical Center Utrecht (UMCU) and Utrecht University (UU).
